A WebGL Playground

Steam Engine
27 August 2022

I wanted to figure out how multiple moving can be animated together within threejs. I chose an old-style industrial steam engine as the subject. While it is not overly complex, the parts must work in sync to give an accurate representation of a mechanical piece of machinery. In three.js this can be achieved by syncing one animation action with others.

This project also allowed me to get familiar with the animation system of three.js.
